manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 110-lb Impact Resistance The Ultimate Screen Protection Keep your screen protected from anything life throws at it. Armorite is made from the toughest tempered glass and withstands over 110 lb of force in the lab to make sure that it provides SGS-certified military-grade defense against even the worst accidents in the field.

Fingerprint-Resistant Coating Smooth and Clean Say goodbye to a screen covered in fingerprints and smudges thanks to a thin, specially formulated coating that repels oil, water, and dirt. The oleophobic coating resists fingerprint and smudge buildup and makes cleaning your screen with just the wipe of a damp cloth quick and easy. Make sure every swipe, drag, or touch is smooth while your screen stays looking great.

Crystal Clear Stunning Clarity Keep your display flawless while your screen stays protected with ultra-transparent glass. High-quality glass with 92% transparency is so clear you won’t even notice it invisibly defending your screen while you watch videos, game, or FaceTime family. Enjoy the same crisp display and every detail in perfect clarity while keeping your screen safe and enjoying flawless Face ID.

Previous page Case Friendly Just Enough Space for a Case Leaves a sliver of space at the edge of your screen to ensure there’s enough room for a case. Highly Scratch Resistant Tough as Nails Ultra-hard glass powerfully resists scratches and cracking to keep your display looking stunning. Effortless Application Quick, Easy, Bubble Free Dust-Repellant Adhesive Bye-Bye Bubbles Anti-static adhesive prevents protector from attracting dust during application to prevent bubbles. Next page 1 Case Friendly 2 Highly Scratch Resistant 3 Effortless Application 4 Dust-Repellant Adhesive

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality packaging, easy to install, and feels amazing
reviews.reviewText: The ESR Armorite Glass Screen Protector has been amazing so far, with everything being thought of from its installation to its quality feel.The first thing that stands out about the ESR Armorite is its exceptional durability. It’s crafted from a high-quality tempered glass that boasts an 9H hardness rating - this is my first time using a glass screen protector with this rating and I’m in love.Despite its toughness, the Armorite screen protector doesn’t compromise on clarity or touch sensitivity. The ultra-clear glass preserves the vibrant display of the 15 pro, and the responsiveness is as smooth as the original screen. This makes it perfect for both everyday use and more demanding tasks.Another feature that I appreciate is the hassle-free installation process. The package includes a full installation kit that made it easy to apply the screen protector without any bubbles or misalignment, a common issue that I’ve ran into with other screen protectors.All in all, I know it’s slightly more expensive than other options but the price is well worth the quality product you get!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality Product
reviews.reviewText: My first impressions of this product is that it’s of a high quality. I was hesitant to buy the 4 pack of screen plus camera protectors that were about $7 but I am glad I went with this choice instead.To start the packaging looked nice and it came with everything you needed, including the non slip surface to set the phone on.Applying the screens provided to be quite simple so long as you follow the directions.So far the adhesive arms to have worked perfectly and it was actually the best application of a screen protector I have ever done. Once I was finished there was not a single air or dust bubble on the entire screen which I have never been able to achieve before.If you initially get some air pockets after applying the glass do not worry!I did as well, but as the instructions say just gently lift up the sides where the air bubbles are and then slowly work them out with the micro fiber cloth. They will eventually all disappear. I had a couple stubborn ones that it took me about 3-4 times each of gently lifting up the screen with my fingernail until I could see the adhesive uncover the bubble and try again. (Note) I took off the guide at this point to help peel back the screen.The camera protectors application was also a breeze and they seem like they will provide adequate protection while not being too obtrusive.Other than that I think these feel like you’re getting three high quality protectors for half the price of the top brands.If you were on the edge of getting these or some really cheap ones like I was, I highly recommend getting these. I’ll update later on how well they are holding up after a month or two.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Screen Protector. A Seamless Blend of Functionality and Aesthetics
reviews.reviewText: The screen protector was remarkably easy to install, offering full coverage with smoothly rounded edges for a satisfying swipe experience. The border creates the illusion of a screen protector-free display, enhancing the overall aesthetic. It minimally attracts fingerprints, surpassing other tested options. The front-facing camera retains clarity, with no Face ID issues. The back camera also stays clear post-installation. I highly recommend this screen protector – it's the best on the market, and it even comes in a set of three for the screen and one for the back camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy screen protectors
reviews.reviewText: The screen protectors were quite easy to put on. It comes with 3 screen protectors and 1 set of camera protectors. My iPhone 15 Pro Max came in today so I was finally able to put these on. The camera screen protection perfectly aligns with the cameras and was a breeze to put on and I didn't find any air bubbles. However, I did encounter a few tiny air bubbles when putting on the screen protection. Very likely to be user error or user handling of the cover. I'm really nit picky when it comes to air bubbles. I was able to clear them by using a credit card and apply pressure to remove them. I just press against them and move them out to the sides. If you mess up, it's fine. It comes with 3 screen protectors so you can always use another one. The screen protector does appear to be slightly thicker than other tempered glass ones. The black surrounding on the screen protector looks fine even though it may appear that you are losing a bit of screen real estate. Although I don't really see me losing any, it would be nice if it was clear instead for the greater peace of mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid screen protector, black border covers some of the display
reviews.reviewText: I just had to make an edit: I replaced this screen protector with another one for testing, and I was playing around with it before throwing it away. I can honestly say this is the strongest glass screen protector I've ever handled. It's basically plastic in how much it can bend and withstand, but it is made of glass, and feels like it. I eventually got it to shatter, but it took so much more punishment than I thought possible.This screen protector is advertised as more tempered and stronger than the other ESR glass screen protector, and since I’ve been using it, it hasn’t cracked. Still, the durability remains to be seen. The screen protector is super clear, super smooth, and super easy to install. The alignment bracket is perfectly fitted and helps the installation tremendously. The packaging is top notch as well, and the fact that it comes with 3 screen protectors is a huge bonus.That being said, I got the 15 Pro Max because of the better screen and smaller bezels. ESR continues to make screen protectors with a substantial black bezel around the edges, which cuts into the tiny bezels around the phone. With that, I cannot recommend this screen protector wholeheartedly.I asked support why this was the case, and this was their response: “In order to get the protector to adhere properly to the entire curved surface, the black border has to be made slightly wider than the actual viewable screen. This ensures complete coverage and prevents issues like preventing issues like lifted edges, not sticking or peeling off.“

This kit comes with everything you need to install. The cover itself is very sturdy and appears to be tough. I’ve had it a couple months with no visible damage. Also fits will with the cases I bought. Edges are nicely rounded, so it feels good on the hands too.The best feature is how oleophobic it is. Ginger oils just don’t stick to the screen at all, so it always looks great.Highly recommended.
Creo que el marco negro reduce un poco la pantalla, fuera de eso es producto de buena calidad

The fitting tray makes installation super easy as it lines it up for you. Managed to install it in first try in about 5 minutes and it looks amazing! Protector clarity is very good and has no issues with touch sensitivity. Almost edge to edge protection.The microfibre cloth, wipes and dust stickers was included Dust stickers help in removing the smaller pieces after cleaning it, but I installed it right after opening the phone so there wasn't much to begin with.Overall, for a three-pack which means if you mess up the first time, or it cracks after dropping, this is a great deal for how easy and simple it is to install! Definitely worth it.

When it comes to screen protectors, this one for the iPhone 13 is nothing short of a superhero. With a sleek alignment tool that ensures a perfect fit, applying it is a breeze. It's so precisely aligned that even the pickiest perfectionist won't find a fault.But it's not just about looks – this protector goes beyond aesthetics. It wraps your screen from edge to edge, hugging those black bezels, and even extends its protective embrace to the speaker grill. Say goodbye to dust and accidental scratches on your speakers. Plus, it doesn't mess with your FaceID mojo – no recalibration needed.Durability? Check. The coating on this glass is tougher than a tank. It laughs off scratches and smudges like a pro. And let's talk adhesion – it's like a magnetic bond with your screen, no awkward peeling moments. In a world full of screen protectors, this one stands tall as the guardian your iPhone 13 deserves. If you want a sizzling combo of protection, style, and ease, look no further.

reviews.reviewTitle: An easy to install, smudge and fingerprint resistant screen protector
reviews.reviewText: I would never use any mobile device without throwing on a case and screen protector from ESR first! I have always liked using ESR screen protectors because they're always so well made, fit perfectly, and come with a handy installation frame to ensure the screen protector is always perfectly aligned. Previous ESR protectors have always been really good quality with just the right thickness and scratch resistance to make them last for YEARS. This latest version of their screen protector is even MORE substantial than previous versions I've used. It feels slightly thicker and now they've included a very fine black border around the perimeter of the protector to make the edge of the protector "vanish" into the dark black display of the phone. The protector is sized JUST right so that if you decide to put your phone into a case that the edges of the case will not interfere with the protector. I currently use an ESR Classic Hybrid case and the protector naturally, fits flawlessly with minimal "gap" between the edge of the screen protector and the installed case. This fitment holds true with other brands of cases as well so ESR clearly did their homework as far as "spec'ing" out the edge clearances. Installation is so easy and one would be hard pressed to screw up because ESR supplies everything to ensure the installation goes smoothly. The Armorite protector comes with not 1 but 2 screen VERY well made screen protectors, the accompanying cleaning and surface prep kit and my favorite, the installation alignment frame! Pretty hard to mess things up especially when they have clearly written instructions and good quality parts that come in the kit.One thing I noticed about this screen protector is its resistance to smudges and fingerprints. I tend to leave a lot of fingerprints on things but strangely this screen protector seems to stay clean a LOT longer than I'd expect. Cleaning is equally a cinch - just wipe with a damp cloth and it looks brand new. no harsh cleaners or sprays needed.100% recommend this product (and other ESR) products. Truly an amazing company with an amazing product.
